title: Lucy Frazer – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Lucy Frazer, the Conservative MP for South East Cambridgeshire, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I’m backing Rishi Sunak for PM. We are facing serious economic challenges as a country. Having worked with Rishi at the Treasury I know he has the skills and experience to provide the leadership we need.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
